LanguageData.Sick.stages.0.label: Sick
LanguageData.Sick.stages.0.description: I think have a flu.. I feel so weak. I might be down for days.
LanguageData.Nauseated.stages.0.label: 恶心
LanguageData.Nauseated.stages.0.description: I suddenly felt nauseated and sick, I threw up a lot didn't I?
LanguageData.Anemic.stages.0.label: 贫血
LanguageData.Amnesia.stages.0.label: 失忆
LanguageData.Amnesia.stages.0.description: I suddenly forgot everything, that's not good.
LanguageData.Scurvy.stages.0.label: 坏血病
LanguageData.Scurvy.stages.0.description: My legs, arms and whole body hurts and my wounds doesn't seem to be healing.
LanguageData.TookMedicine.stages.0.label: 吃了药
LanguageData.TookMedicine.stages.0.description: That medicine was miraculous. I'm still feeling a bit woozy, but overall I'm good to go.
LanguageData.ColonistBasicSickness.stages.0.label: 一个殖民者生病了
LanguageData.ColonistBasicSickness.stages.0.descripti: A colonist is sick, we'd better be careful on what he/she is having, it could be worse.
LanguageData.ColonistPassedAwayNatural.stages.0.label: 一个殖民者老死了
LanguageData.ColonistPassedAwayNatural.stages.0.descr: A colonist had just passed away he/she lived a long and fruitful life, may he/she rest in peace.
LanguageData.ColonistPassedAwayWounds.stages.0.label: 一个殖民者因为重伤死了
LanguageData.ColonistPassedAwayWounds.stages.0.descri: A colonist had just passed away, he/she couldn't hold on to dear life, may he/she rest in peace.
LanguageData.ColonistStroke.stages.0.label: 一个殖民者中风摔倒
LanguageData.ColonistStroke.stages.0.description: One of the colonist suddenly tumbled down, he/she should take it easy and rest, good thing we acted quickly and reached him/her to bed.
LanguageData.EclipseSubEventAFeral.stages.0.label: 古怪的噩梦
LanguageData.EclipseSubEventAFeral.stages.0.descripti: First an eclipse an now this! when is this nightmare going to end.
LanguageData.EclipseSubEventBMeteor.stages.0.label: 从陨石灾变中存活
LanguageData.EclipseSubEventBMeteor.stages.0.descript: I looked at death itself, good thing I'm still here.
LanguageData.Rescued.stages.0.label: 我可以回家了
LanguageData.Rescued.stages.0.description: The feeling that you can go home after having experienced so much is tantalizing, but I just can't leave this planet. This place is now my home.
LanguageData.MeteorShower.stages.0.label: 我看见了一场流星雨
LanguageData.MeteorShower.stages.0.description: The cosmos, still so beautiful even after abandoning me here.
LanguageData.PrisonBreak.stages.0.label: 囚犯越狱
LanguageData.PrisonBreak.stages.0.description: The prisoners were so crafty they managed to destroy all the doors! everyone was running amok! did we even catch someone?
LanguageData.PrisonerSuicide.stages.0.label: 囚犯自杀
LanguageData.PrisonerSuicide.stages.0.description: How do you even kill yourself in prison?
LanguageData.PrisonRiot.stages.0.label: 监狱暴动
LanguageData.PrisonRiot.stages.0.description: Now that was a definition of anarchy, I wanted to throw punches too!
LanguageData.RaiderSyndicate.stages.0.label: 一个同伴把我们出卖了
LanguageData.RaiderSyndicate.stages.0.description: To think that our former friend would sell us to raiders. This is such a cruel universe.
LanguageData.SolarFlareSubEventACosmicRadiation.stage: Everything went black for a few seconds, and most colonists were down on their knees, my head hurts like hell.
LanguageData.NuclearFalloutThought.stages.0.label: 核事故
